GeneralInfo:
Our first release of the UWP version for Kliva!
Rebuild from the ground up with a newer design and it is now also be better aligned with the Strava API.
Fully Open Source up on GitHub ( https://github.com/AppCreativity/Kliva ), please log any issues there and UWP devs who would love to join are more than welcome
Features: - UWP version, so it now runs on Win10 mobile, Win10 desktop and will also work with Continuum.
- Added GPS tracking, enabling you to track and upload an activity directly to Strava.
- Added Activity editing, some settings on your own Strava activity are now editable from within the app.
- Several new Strava possibilities in reference to the Kliva Windows Phone app.
- Added swipe to right on activity list to give kudos
- Added swipe to left on activity list to add comment
BugFixes: - Bug fix for null to System.Single conversion exception on Get Activity
- Bug fix for not being able to save edited activity information
- Bug fix for go to top button on Activity feed ( we hope )
